Posts.EditableText: Well, I just updated, so I hope you hadn't already had a chance to play. The fireflies, lantern, shards, and scroll are all active now, but were not for a while. It plays best offline, but your connection might be a lot better than mine. It does play either way, but online I froze playing the game and racing (except on my high-speed hour).

Posts.EditableText: I did have to update again, as I had left .png off the fireflies. Oh, well. I hope you had fun, except that. I also erased a duplicate description. ☺⃣
